name: battl3Ship
short_description:
Battl3Ship is the advanced and much funnier version of the popular Battleship game. Each turn, you shoot into 3 coordinates but you only know HOW MANY of these were hits or misses, not WHICH ones were. This add a new dimension of strategy and entertainment to the game.

The game is currently being under development, and there isn't yet any release.
summary: Advanced version of the popular Battleship game: 3 shots per turn
